thread.section_title: YourMechanic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YourMechanic | yourmechanic.com
thread.title: mshusa

author: mshusa
title: mshusa
text:
I know next to nothing about cars. Moreover, I don't want to overcomplicate my life by taking time to take my car to a repair shop if it needs to be checked out or serviced. When a service light goes off, I get an instant headache.
This is where YourMechanic comes in. I have already had a general checkup at my office and my break pads replaced at my place of residence. 0 driving and waiting for your car to be "done" involved!! Expert mechanics showed up at my designated time and place, got the keys, and got to work. They even brought their parts. All I needed to do was to open the garage doors.
This service simplified my life tremendously. On another note, YourMechanic is significantly cheaper than competitors. A win-win.
